snippet.title: UNDERGROUND KINGS | When the Badge Can’t Be Trusted | Full Movie
snippet.description:
A police officer uncovers a betrayal that goes deeper than expected.
To find the truth, he has to disappear into the streets.

When a police officer learns his partner was set up from the inside, he begins a dangerous undercover mission to uncover what really happened. Moving through the criminal underworld of Philadelphia, he traces the connections between street power and corrupt authority. As the lines blur, exposing the truth may cost him everything he has left.

Director: Lionel Anthony Cook
Cast: Christopher Mann, Brian Anthony Wilson, Roberto Lombardi, Al Thompson, John Canada Terrell.
© Published under license.
#UndergroundKings #FullMovie #CrimeThriller #Action #Undercover
